articles.content: One woman was so overcome with joy at the chance to get the coronavirus vaccine that her hands shook as she filled out the paperwork. A man was so excited he did a happy dance. A young woman gleefull… [+3465 chars]

articles.title: Having panic attacks about virus variants? National preparation is the cure - STAT
articles.description: A truly scary variant might be an extremely unlikely event. But as epidemiologists and gamblers know, unlikely events happen every day.
articles.content: The most frightening aspect of a pandemic, on a primal level, involves the emergence of new strains. If you were writing a thriller about a pandemic, this is what would happen: A mutant strain would … [+4018 chars]
